product_name: Bolle King Polarized Sunglasses - Shiny Black - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Bolle King Polarized Sunglasses with Shiny Black Tiki frames combine bold style and athletic performance to keep your eyes shielded from sun and glare during all your outdoor adventures. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Nylon frames are lightweight yet resilient enough to withstand your active lifestyle. Venting system incorporated into the frames enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Grippy rubber temple tips and adjustable nosepads deliver a snug, secure fit that stays in place even when you sweat. Closeout.
short_description: The Bolle King Polarized Sunglasses with Shiny Black Tiki frames combine bold style and athletic performance to keep your eyes shielded from sun and glare during all your outdoor adventures.
